message.body: This fence is pretty incredible! I'm seriously impressed that you just threw that up this weekend!
(Just got here and all is well!!)
Thanks so much. They were probably crazy relieved to see you. They are so spoiled. That was a long day alone. Lol on the fence for the new wild life preserve :)
When you head ustairs, pls check the middle room for a puddle. I don't think he'd do it but oti has occassionally whizzed in there. We meant to put the gate there for the day but forgot
I didn't see anything I think he held it! Piper is being a little shy and won't come down to eat but I'll let her warm up and try to feed her dinner in a bit.
Awww. Pyper! If she doesn't sho interest later you can always just put the food in mc's room for tonight. Soo proud of oti :)
Ah I will do that. Hope the drive is going well

Went well. Did the vassar tour already. Sitting down for some gluten free pizza in poughkeepsie now. Speaking of which. Serioulsy eat whatever you find. I know there is an avocado and tomato and lots of potatos
Oh man sounds good! I have half my lunch still but maybe I'll make a baked potato. Thanks!!
Enjoy pizza!
There is cheddar, salsa and sour to go with :)
The works!!
Sounds like a package may have gotten delivered today. We are expecting 2. The UPS guy sometimes puts stuff by the side door. Can you peek out and see if anythin is there?
Yep. One package so far. I'll keep an eye out for the next one.
Ah, great. Thx!
No problem!
Hope all is well with you and the animals let you sleep until a reasonable hour. Mckenna is dying to know if pyper has warmed up to you yet?
7:30! I feel like that's pretty good for Finn. Pyper is hanging out with us but won't let me pet her yet. I think by tomorrow we will be Bffs.
7:30 is great. That's about as late as they ever let us sleep. Aww, pypes. She's gotta be dying for affection. She'll give in soon :)
I know me too! Its really hard not to snuggle her! But she's getting there
